info.name: AI Business Chat Platform API
info.description:
Complete API collection for the Multi-tenant AI Business Chatbot Platform.

## Getting Started
1. Register a new user
2. Login to get JWT tokens
3. Create an organization (restaurant or real_estate)
4. Add locations to the organization
5. Configure knowledge base
6. **For Restaurants**: Set up menu, hours, booking settings
7. **For Real Estate**: Add property listings
8. Use the widget API for chat

## Verticals
- **Restaurant**: Menu management, bookings, opening hours, daily specials
- **Real Estate**: Property listings, lead management, appointments

## Authentication
All protected endpoints require a Bearer token in the Authorization header.

## Base URL
- Development: http://localhost:8000/api

## Response Codes
- 200: Success
- 201: Created
- 400: Bad Request
- 401: Unauthorized
- 403: Forbidden
- 404: Not Found
- 500: Server Error

item.name: üöÄ Quick Start Flow
item.description: Follow these requests in order to get started with the platform

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Bella Italia Restaurant",
    "business_type": "restaurant",
    "email": "contact@bellaitalia.com",
    "phone": "(555) 123-4567",
    "website": "https://bellaitalia.com",
    "widget_color": "#E74C3C",
    "widget_position": "bottom-right",
    "widget_greeting": "Welcome to Bella Italia! üçù How can I help you today? Ask about our menu, reservations, or hours!"
}

exec: console.log('‚úÖ Knowledge Base created! ID: ' + jsonData.id);

body.raw:
{
    "organization": "{{organizationId}}",
    "business_description": "Bella Italia is an authentic Italian restaurant serving traditional dishes made with fresh, locally-sourced ingredients. We specialize in wood-fired pizzas, handmade pasta, and classic Italian desserts. Family-owned since 1985.",
    "services_offered": [
        "Dine-in service",
        "Takeout and delivery",
        "Catering for events (up to 100 guests)",
        "Private dining room reservations",
        "Wine pairing dinners",
        "Cooking classes on Saturdays"
    ],
    "operating_hours": "Monday-Thursday: 11:00 AM - 10:00 PM\nFriday-Saturday: 11:00 AM - 11:00 PM\nSunday: 12:00 PM - 9:00 PM\nHoliday hours may vary.",
    "contact_info": "Phone: (555) 123-4567\nEmail: reservations@bellaitalia.com\nAddress: 123 Main Street, New York, NY 10001",
    "policies": "Reservations recommended for parties of 6 or more.\nCancellation policy: 24 hours notice required.\nDress code: Smart casual.\nWe are allergy-friendly - please inform staff of any dietary restrictions.\n20% gratuity added for parties of 8+.",
    "additional_info": "Popular dishes: Margherita Pizza, Fettuccine Alfredo, Tiramisu\nAverage price: $25-45 per person\nParking: Free valet parking after 5 PM\nAccessibility: Wheelchair accessible"
}

request.description: Register a new user account. Returns JWT tokens on success.
Login with email and password. Returns access and refresh JWT tokens.
Get a new access token using the refresh token.
Get the currently authenticated user's profile and organizations.
Logout and invalidate the refresh token.
Get all organizations the current user belongs to.

body.raw:
{
    "name": "My Restaurant",
    "business_type": "restaurant",
    "email": "info@myrestaurant.com",
    "phone": "(555) 555-5555",
    "website": "https://myrestaurant.com",
    "widget_color": "#3B82F6",
    "widget_position": "bottom-right",
    "widget_greeting": "Hello! How can I assist you today?"
}

request.description: Create a new organization. The creating user becomes the owner.
Get detailed information about a specific organization.
Update organization settings.
List all locations for an organization.
Add a new location to the organization.
Add a new team member. User must already have an account.

body.raw:
{
    "organization": "{{organizationId}}",
    "business_description": "We are a family-owned Italian restaurant serving authentic cuisine since 1985.",
    "services_offered": ["Dine-in", "Takeout", "Catering", "Private events"],
    "operating_hours": "Mon-Thu: 11AM-10PM, Fri-Sat: 11AM-11PM, Sun: 12PM-9PM",
    "contact_info": "Phone: (555) 123-4567, Email: info@restaurant.com",
    "policies": "Reservations recommended for parties of 6+. Smart casual dress code.",
    "additional_info": "Free parking available. Wheelchair accessible."
}

request.description: Create a knowledge base with business information for the AI to use.

query.description: Filter by state: new, ai_handling, human_handoff, resolved, archived

request.description: Send a message as a human agent.

item.name: üîå Widget API (Public)
item.description: Public API for the embeddable chat widget - NO authentication required

request.description: Get widget configuration. Use the widget_key from your organization.
Start a new chat session. Returns session_token for subsequent messages.
Send a message and get AI response. The AI uses your knowledge base to answer.
Get full conversation history for the current session.

item.name: üçΩÔ∏è Restaurant - Menu Categories
item.description: Manage menu categories for restaurant organizations

body.raw:
{
    "organization": "{{organizationId}}",
    "name": "Appetizers",
    "description": "Start your meal with our delicious appetizers",
    "display_order": 1,
    "is_active": true
}

item.name: üçï Restaurant - Menu Items
item.description: Manage menu items for restaurant organizations

body.raw:
{
    "category": "{{menuCategoryId}}",
    "name": "Bruschetta",
    "description": "Toasted bread topped with fresh tomatoes, garlic, and basil",
    "price": "9.99",
    "dietary_info": ["vegetarian", "vegan-option"],
    "allergens": ["gluten"],
    "is_available": true,
    "is_featured": true,
    "display_order": 1
}

request.description: Toggle menu item availability on/off

item.name: üïê Restaurant - Opening Hours
item.description: Manage opening hours for restaurant locations

request.description: Create opening hours. day_of_week: 0=Monday, 6=Sunday
Create opening hours for multiple days at once
recurring_days: 0=Monday, 6=Sunday

body.raw:
{
    "location": "{{locationId}}",
    "max_party_size": 12,
    "min_party_size": 1,
    "slot_duration_minutes": 90,
    "advance_booking_days": 30,
    "min_advance_hours": 2,
    "auto_confirm": true,
    "require_phone": true,
    "require_email": true,
    "cancellation_policy": "Cancellations must be made 24 hours in advance.",
    "confirmation_message": "Thank you for your reservation! We look forward to seeing you."
}

{
    "location": "{{locationId}}",
    "booking_date": "2025-02-15",
    "booking_time": "19:00:00",
    "party_size": 4,
    "customer_name": "John Doe",
    "customer_email": "john@example.com",
    "customer_phone": "555-123-4567",
    "special_requests": "Window seat preferred. One guest has a nut allergy.",
    "source": "phone"
}

item.name: üçΩÔ∏è Restaurant - Public Widget API
item.description: Public endpoints for restaurant widget - NO authentication required

request.description: Get full menu with categories and items for widget display
Get today's specials for widget display
Get opening hours for widget display
Check available booking slots for a specific date and party size

body.raw:
{
    "widget_key": "{{widgetKey}}",
    "booking_date": "2025-02-15",
    "booking_time": "19:00:00",
    "party_size": 4,
    "customer_name": "Jane Smith",
    "customer_email": "jane@example.com",
    "customer_phone": "555-987-6543",
    "special_requests": "Anniversary dinner, can we get a quiet table?"
}

request.description: Create a booking via the chat widget

item.name: üè† Real Estate - Property Listings
item.description: Manage property listings for real estate organizations

body.raw:
{
    "organization": "{{organizationId}}",
    "listing_type": "sale",
    "property_type": "house",
    "title": "Beautiful 4BR Family Home with Pool",
    "description": "Stunning single-family home in a quiet neighborhood. Features include updated kitchen, hardwood floors, and a private backyard with pool.",
    "price": "850000.00",
    "bedrooms": 4,
    "bathrooms": "3.0",
    "square_feet": 2800,
    "lot_size": 0.5,
    "year_built": 2015,
    "address_line1": "123 Oak Street",
    "city": "Austin",
    "state": "TX",
    "postal_code": "78701",
    "country": "USA",
    "latitude": "30.2672",
    "longitude": "-97.7431",
    "features": ["pool", "garage", "hardwood-floors", "central-ac", "updated-kitchen"],
    "is_featured": true,
    "status": "active"
}

item.name: üë§ Real Estate - Leads
item.description: Manage real estate leads and qualifications

body.raw:
{
    "organization": "{{organizationId}}",
    "name": "Michael Johnson",
    "email": "michael@example.com",
    "phone": "555-111-2222",
    "intent": "buy",
    "budget_min": 500000,
    "budget_max": 800000,
    "preferred_areas": ["Downtown Austin", "Mueller", "East Austin"],
    "property_type_preference": "house",
    "bedrooms_min": 3,
    "bedrooms_max": 4,
    "notes": "Pre-approved for mortgage. Looking to move within 3 months.",
    "source": "phone",
    "priority": "high"
}

request.description: Get high-priority leads with score >= 70

item.name: üè† Real Estate - Public Widget API
item.description: Public endpoints for real estate widget - NO authentication required

request.description: Search available properties via widget. Filter by listing_type, min/max price, bedrooms, bathrooms, property_type, city
Get detailed property information via widget

body.raw:
{
    "widget_key": "{{widgetKey}}",
    "name": "Sarah Williams",
    "email": "sarah@example.com",
    "phone": "555-333-4444",
    "intent": "buy",
    "message": "I'm interested in 3-4 bedroom homes in the Mueller area. My budget is around $600-750k.",
    "property_id": "{{propertyId}}"
}

request.description: Capture a lead via the chat widget. Property ID is optional.
